languages.text: "Я не говорил тебе думать, {name}. Я сказал, что мне от тебя нужно. И ответ, подобный твоему, меня не удовле..."
"I did not tell you to think about it, {name}. I told you what I need from you. And your response has displ—"
languages.original_text: "Я не говорил тебе думать, {name}. Я сказал, что мне от тебя нужно. И ответ, подобный твоему, меня не удовле..."

traits.locale_text: "I did not tell you to think about it, {name}. I told you what I need from you. And your response has displ—"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not tell you to think about it, {name}. I told you what I need from you. And your response has displ—"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我可不是在让你考虑，{name}。我已经告诉了你我需要你做什么，而你的答复让我很是不——”
languages.original_text: "I did not tell you to think about it, {name}. I told you what I need from you. And your response has displ—"

traits.locale_text: “我可不是在让你考虑，{name}。我已经告诉了你我需要你做什么，而你的答复让我很是不——”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は考えてくれとは言ってないぜ、{name}。要求を伝えたまでだ。なのにお前の反応ときたら―」
languages.original_text: "I did not tell you to think about it, {name}. I told you what I need from you. And your response has displ—"

traits.locale_text: 「俺は考えてくれとは言ってないぜ、{name}。要求を伝えたまでだ。なのにお前の反応ときたら―」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No te dije que te lo pensaras, {name}. Te dije lo que necesito de ti. Y tu respuesta me ha decep...».
languages.original_text: "I did not tell you to think about it, {name}. I told you what I need from you. And your response has displ—"

traits.locale_text: «No te dije que te lo pensaras, {name}. Te dije lo que necesito de ti. Y tu respuesta me ha decep...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vous ai pas demandé d'y réfléchir, {name}. Je vous ai dit ce que j'attendais de vous et votre réponse me déplaît fortem... »
languages.original_text: "I did not tell you to think about it, {name}. I told you what I need from you. And your response has displ—"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous ai pas demandé d'y réfléchir, {name}. Je vous ai dit ce que j'attendais de vous et votre réponse me déplaît fortem... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr sollt ihn nicht bedenken, {name}. Ich habe Euch klar gesagt, was ich von Euch verlange. Und Eure Antwort verär..."
languages.original_text: "I did not tell you to think about it, {name}. I told you what I need from you. And your response has displ—"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sollt ihn nicht bedenken, {name}. Ich habe Euch klar gesagt, was ich von Euch verlange. Und Eure Antwort verär..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "I did not tell you to think about it, . I told you what I need from you. And your response has displ—"

languages.text: "Sana önerimi düşün demedim {name}. Sana senden ne istediğimi söyledim. Cevabın ise beni sinirle..."
languages.original_text: "I did not tell you to think about it, {name}. I told you what I need from you. And your response has displ—"

traits.locale_text: "Sana onun hakkında düşün demedim {name}. Sana senden ne istediğimi söyledim. Cevabın ise beni sinirle..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
